      • languagePressed

        public void languagePressed()
        React to the Language selection button being pressed. Lets user choose a language.

      • controlsPressed

        public void controlsPressed()
        React to the Controls selection button being pressed. Go to the Controls menu.

      • aspectratioPressed

        public void aspectratioPressed()
        React to the Aspect Ratio checkbox being pressed. Toggles aspect ratio on or off.

      • backPressed

        public void backPressed()
        React to the Back button being pressed. Returns to the Main menu.
